destination_id_1.name: Rome, Italy
destination_id_1.description: A historic city with ancient ruins, art, and architecture.
destination_id_1.review: Exploring Rome was an unforgettable experience—walking through centuries of history, savoring authentic Italian cuisine, and soaking in the city’s rich culture and charm. – Ayesha Kapoor

experiences.title: Colosseum and Roman Forum Guided Tour
experiences.description: Explore ancient Roman landmarks with expert guides bringing history to life.

experiences.title: Authentic Pasta Making Class
experiences.description: Learn to make fresh Italian pasta in a Roman kitchen.

experiences.title: Roman Summer Festival
experiences.description: Enjoy live music, street performances, and food during the annual summer celebration.

destination_id_2.name: Kyoto, Japan
destination_id_2.description: A city known for its classical Buddhist temples, gardens, and imperial palaces.
destination_id_2.review: Visiting Kyoto was a serene and captivating experience—immersing in ancient temples, tranquil gardens, and the timeless beauty of Japanese tradition. – Rohan Mehta

experiences.title: Traditional Tea Ceremony
experiences.description: Participate in an authentic Japanese tea ceremony in a Kyoto teahouse.

experiences.title: Arashiyama Bamboo Grove Stroll
experiences.description: Walk through one of Japan’s most iconic and tranquil bamboo forests.

experiences.title: Gion Matsuri
experiences.description: Experience Kyoto's most famous festival with parades, street food, and cultural events.

destination_id_3.name: Santorini, Greece
destination_id_3.description: A stunning island with whitewashed buildings, blue-domed churches, and breathtaking sunsets.
destination_id_3.review: Santorini was a dreamlike escape—breathtaking sunsets, whitewashed villages, and crystal-clear waters made every moment magical. – Neha Sharma

destination_id_4.name: Machu Picchu, Peru
destination_id_4.description: An ancient Incan citadel set high in the Andes Mountains, offering stunning views and rich history.
destination_id_4.review: Machu Picchu was a breathtaking adventure—surrounded by misty mountains, ancient ruins, and a deep sense of wonder at every step. – Arjun Desai

destination_id_5.name: Paris, France
destination_id_5.description: Known as the city of love, Paris is filled with iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre.
destination_id_5.review: Paris was a romantic and enchanting experience—strolling along the Seine, admiring iconic landmarks, and indulging in exquisite pastries. – Meera Joshi

destination_id_6.name: New York City, USA
destination_id_6.description: A vibrant metropolis known for its arts, culture, and iconic skyline.
destination_id_6.review: New York was an electrifying experience—buzzing with energy, iconic sights, and endless possibilities around every corner. – Karan Malhotra

destination_id_7.name: Sydney, Australia
destination_id_7.description: Known for its beautiful beaches and the iconic Sydney Opera House.
destination_id_7.review: Sydney was a vibrant coastal adventure—stunning beaches, iconic landmarks, and a perfect blend of nature and city life. – Ananya Verma

destination_id_8.name: Banff National Park, Canada
destination_id_8.description: A pristine wilderness area with turquoise lakes and snow-capped mountains.
destination_id_8.review: Banff National Park was a nature lover’s paradise—turquoise lakes, majestic mountains, and serene wilderness that left me in awe. – Vikram Nair

destination_id_9.name: Great Barrier Reef, Australia
destination_id_9.description: The world's largest coral reef system, known for its vibrant marine life.
destination_id_9.review: The Great Barrier Reef was a mesmerizing underwater wonder—vibrant coral gardens, diverse marine life, and an unforgettable snorkeling experience. – Priya Menon

destination_id_10.name: Dubai, UAE
destination_id_10.description: A futuristic city known for its skyscrapers, luxury shopping, and man-made islands.
destination_id_10.review: Dubai was a dazzling fusion of luxury and innovation—soaring skyscrapers, desert adventures, and world-class shopping made it truly unforgettable. – Rahul Chandra

destination_id_11.name: Cairo, Egypt
destination_id_11.description: Famous for the Pyramids of Giza and the Great Sphinx, a hub of ancient Egyptian civilization.
destination_id_11.review: Cairo was a captivating journey through time—ancient pyramids, bustling bazaars, and rich Egyptian heritage at every turn. – Sana Rizvi

destination_id_12.name: Cape Town, South Africa
destination_id_12.description: A beautiful coastal city surrounded by mountains, known for its iconic Table Mountain.
destination_id_12.review: Cape Town was a breathtaking blend of mountains, oceans, and culture—each day filled with stunning views and vibrant local experiences. – Devika Iyer

destination_id_13.name: Buenos Aires, Argentina
destination_id_13.description: A vibrant city known for its European-style architecture and tango dancing.
destination_id_13.review: Buenos Aires was a lively and passionate escape—tango rhythms, historic streets, and a vibrant mix of culture and cuisine. – Aman Kulkarni

experiences.title: Tango Night in San Telmo
experiences.description: Attend an authentic tango performance in the historic district of San Telmo.

experiences.title: Recoleta Cemetery & City Architecture Walk
experiences.description: Discover iconic architecture and stories of Argentina’s past in this walking tour of Recoleta.

experiences.title: Argentinian Asado Cooking Workshop
experiences.description: Join a local chef to learn the secrets of preparing traditional Argentine barbecue.

experiences.title: La Feria de Mataderos
experiences.description: Experience traditional crafts, gaucho performances, and folkloric music at this vibrant local fair.

destination_id_14.name: Bangkok, Thailand
destination_id_14.description: A bustling metropolis known for its temples, street food, and vibrant nightlife.
destination_id_14.review: Bangkok was an exhilarating mix of tradition and modernity—bustling markets, ornate temples, and mouthwatering street food around every corner. – Sneha Reddy

destination_id_15.name: Istanbul, Turkey
destination_id_15.description: A city that bridges Europe and Asia, famous for its stunning mosques and Byzantine architecture.
destination_id_15.review: Istanbul was a magical crossroads of East and West—rich history, stunning architecture, and vibrant bazaars made every moment unforgettable. – Farhan Qureshi

destination_id_16.name: Helsinki, Finland
destination_id_16.description: A modern city with a blend of Finnish culture, stunning design, and a rich history.
destination_id_16.review: Helsinki was a peaceful Nordic gem—sleek design, cozy cafés, and a perfect blend of nature and modern city life. – Isha Malhotra

destination_id_17.name: Reykjavik, Iceland
destination_id_17.description: The capital city of Iceland known for its stunning geothermal features and the Northern Lights.
destination_id_17.review: Reykjavik was a surreal Arctic adventure—colorful streets, soothing hot springs, and a gateway to Iceland’s otherworldly landscapes. – Kabir Sen

destination_id_18.name: Prague, Czech Republic
destination_id_18.description: A city filled with Gothic and Baroque architecture, charming streets, and a rich history.
destination_id_18.review: Prague was a fairytale come to life—cobblestone streets, Gothic spires, and a magical charm that lingers long after you leave. – Riya Kapoor

destination_id_19.name: Lisbon, Portugal
destination_id_19.description: A charming city with rich history, colorful streets, and stunning views over the Atlantic Ocean.
destination_id_19.review: Lisbon was a sun-kissed delight—vibrant neighborhoods, historic trams, and breathtaking views from every hilltop. – Aarav Mishra

destination_id_20.name: Delhi, India
destination_id_20.description: Delhi is India's capital, known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and bustling urban life.
destination_id_20.review: Delhi was a dynamic tapestry of old and new—majestic monuments, bustling markets, and a rich blend of cultures and flavors. – Tanya Bansal

destination_id_21.name: Athens, Greece
destination_id_21.description: The cradle of Western civilization, home to iconic sites like the Acropolis and Parthenon.
destination_id_21.review: Athens was a journey through ancient glory—towering ruins, rich mythology, and a vibrant street life full of character. – Rohan Khanna

destination_id_22.name: Amsterdam, Netherlands
destination_id_22.description: A picturesque city with canals, vibrant art scenes, and historic architecture.
destination_id_22.review: Amsterdam was a charming and laid-back escape—canal-side strolls, artistic treasures, and a welcoming vibe around every corner. – Nisha Verma

destination_id_23.name: Seoul, South Korea
destination_id_23.description: A bustling metropolis blending modern skyscrapers with ancient palaces and temples.
destination_id_23.review: Seoul was an exhilarating blend of tradition and tech—ancient palaces, buzzing night markets, and futuristic cityscapes all in one. – Arvind Rao

destination_id_24.name: Vancouver, Canada
destination_id_24.description: A city surrounded by nature, known for its mountains, beaches, and vibrant urban life.
destination_id_24.review: Vancouver was a stunning fusion of nature and city life—towering mountains, scenic waterfronts, and a refreshing, multicultural vibe. – Maya Deshmukh

destination_id_25.name: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
destination_id_25.description: A vibrant city known for its carnival, beautiful beaches, and the iconic Christ the Redeemer statue.
destination_id_25.review: Rio de Janeiro was an unforgettable celebration of life—golden beaches, vibrant samba beats, and breathtaking views from every peak. – Ishaan Roy

destination_id_26.name: Kolkata, India
destination_id_26.description: Kolkata is a cultural hub in India, known for its colonial architecture, arts, and intellectual heritage.
destination_id_26.review: Kolkata was a soulful journey through culture and history—colonial charm, artistic spirit, and the warmth of its people at every turn. – Anjali Sen

destination_id_27.name: Mysore, India
destination_id_27.description: A city where heritage and tranquility blend to create timeless beauty.
destination_id_27.review: Mysore was a regal and serene retreat—majestic palaces, fragrant gardens, and a rich heritage that echoes through every street. – Aditya Rao

destination_id_28.name: Auckland, New Zealand
destination_id_28.description: Known for its stunning natural beauty, Auckland offers a mix of beaches, parks, and volcanic landscapes.
destination_id_28.review: Auckland was a refreshing coastal escape—lush landscapes, vibrant harbors, and a perfect mix of adventure and relaxation. – Rhea Mukherjee

destination_id_29.name: Gangtok, India
destination_id_29.description: Amidst the clouds and mountains, Gangtok whispers the serenity of the Himalayas.
destination_id_29.review: Gangtok was a peaceful mountain haven—misty hills, vibrant monasteries, and breathtaking views that soothe the soul. – Tenzing Bhutia

destination_id_30.name: Tawang, India
destination_id_30.description: A serene haven where the mountains whisper ancient tales and spirituality fills the air.
destination_id_30.review: Tawang was a hidden gem in the Himalayas—pristine landscapes, spiritual monasteries, and a serene atmosphere that touches the heart. – Namrata Rai

destination_id_31.name: Moscow, Russia
destination_id_31.description: A city steeped in history, known for the Kremlin, Red Square, and its grand architecture.
destination_id_31.review: Moscow was a grand and captivating city—iconic architecture, rich history, and a powerful blend of culture and resilience. – Arjun Malhotra

destination_id_32.name: Edinburgh, Scotland
destination_id_32.description: A city famous for its medieval Old Town, beautiful castles, and vibrant festivals.
destination_id_32.review: Edinburgh was a poetic blend of history and charm—medieval castles, cobbled streets, and a magical atmosphere that lingers in the air. – Tara Nambiar

destination_id_33.name: Srinagar, India
destination_id_33.description: A paradise on earth, where the tranquil waters meet snow-capped peaks and timeless beauty unfolds.
destination_id_33.review: Srinagar was a breathtaking paradise on earth—serene lakes, blooming gardens, and the tranquil beauty of the Himalayas all around. – Zoya Mirza

destination_id_34.name: Madrid, Spain
destination_id_34.description: A city brimming with history, art, and vibrant nightlife, including the Prado Museum and Royal Palace.
destination_id_34.review: Madrid was a vibrant celebration of art, culture, and life—elegant boulevards, lively plazas, and an irresistible Spanish spirit. – Karan Sethi

destination_id_35.name: Mumbai, India
destination_id_35.description: Mumbai is India's financial and cultural hub, known for its nightlife, film industry, and diversity.
destination_id_35.review: Mumbai was an energetic whirlwind of dreams and diversity—iconic landmarks, bustling streets, and an unstoppable spirit that never sleeps. – Simran Mehta

destination_id_36.name: Montreal, Canada
destination_id_36.description: Known for its French heritage, Montreal offers a mix of old-world charm and modern cultural experiences.
destination_id_36.review: Montreal was a charming fusion of European flair and North American energy—cobblestone streets, artistic vibes, and a warm, bilingual culture. – Neil Chatterjee

destination_id_37.name: Vienna, Austria
destination_id_37.description: The city of music and art, home to imperial palaces, grand museums, and beautiful gardens.
destination_id_37.review: Vienna was a symphony of elegance and history—grand palaces, classical music, and a refined charm that enchants every visitor. – Aanya Singh

destination_id_38.name: Goa, India
destination_id_38.description: Goa is a coastal paradise in India, famous for its beaches, vibrant nightlife, and Portuguese heritage.
destination_id_38.review: Goa was a blissful coastal escape—golden beaches, vibrant nightlife, and a laid-back vibe that makes you never want to leave. – Rahul D’Souza

destination_id_39.name: Hyderabad, India
destination_id_39.description: Hyderabad is a historic city in India, known for its rich culture, cuisine, and tech industry.
destination_id_39.review: Hyderabad was a rich blend of heritage and modernity—majestic forts, delectable biryani, and a city that tells tales of royalty and innovation. – Sana Iqbal

destination_id_40.name: Guwahati, India
destination_id_40.description: Known for its natural beauty, cultural heritage, and as a gateway to Northeast India.
destination_id_40.review: Guwahati was a serene gateway to the Northeast—sacred temples, lush landscapes, and the gentle flow of the Brahmaputra creating a soulful experience. – Ankit Das

destination_id_41.name: Marrakech, Morocco
destination_id_41.description: A vibrant city full of life, offering stunning palaces, bustling souks, and captivating history.
destination_id_41.review: Marrakech was a sensory adventure—vibrant souks, intricate architecture, and the captivating aroma of spices in the desert air. – Leila Khan

destination_id_42.name: Stockholm, Sweden
destination_id_42.description: A beautiful city spread across 14 islands, known for its stunning architecture and rich cultural life.
destination_id_42.review: Stockholm was a graceful blend of innovation and tradition—scenic archipelagos, stylish design, and a calm, cosmopolitan charm. – Vikram Joshi

destination_id_43.name: Chennai, India
destination_id_43.description: Coastal city in South India, known for its classical arts, vibrant culture, and IT industry.
destination_id_43.review: Chennai was a soulful coastal city—rich in culture, classical arts, and warm hospitality wrapped in the rhythm of temple bells and sea breeze. – Divya Subramanian

destination_id_44.name: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
destination_id_44.description: A vibrant city known for its carnival, beautiful beaches, and the iconic Christ the Redeemer statue.
destination_id_44.review: Rio de Janeiro was a vibrant burst of energy—stunning beaches, festive rhythms, and iconic landscapes that leave you breathless. – Rafael Fernandes

destination_id_45.name: Tokyo, Japan
destination_id_45.description: A high-tech metropolis blending traditional temples with futuristic architecture and pop culture.
destination_id_45.review: Tokyo was a dazzling fusion of tradition and futurism—ancient shrines, neon-lit streets, and an energy that never fades. – Keiko Sato

destination_id_46.name: Bangalore, India
destination_id_46.description: Bangalore is India's tech hub, known for its innovation, vibrant culture, and pleasant climate.
destination_id_46.review: Bangalore was a dynamic mix of innovation and greenery—bustling tech hubs, charming cafés, and a cool vibe that feels like home. – Anirudh Menon

destination_id_47.name: Berlin, Germany
destination_id_47.description: A city with a rich history, including the Berlin Wall, Brandenburg Gate, and a vibrant arts scene.
destination_id_47.review: Berlin was a bold tapestry of history and creativity—iconic landmarks, edgy art scenes, and a spirit of resilience and reinvention. – Lara Schmid

destination_id_48.name: Lucknow, India
destination_id_48.description: A historic city in Uttar Pradesh, known for its Mughal architecture, rich culture, and refined cuisine
destination_id_48.review: Lucknow was a graceful journey through Nawabi elegance—rich heritage, exquisite cuisine, and timeless charm in every corner. – Imran Zaidi

destination_id_49.name: Los Angeles, USA
destination_id_49.description: A city of dreams, famous for Hollywood, sandy beaches, and vibrant nightlife.
destination_id_49.review: Los Angeles was a dazzling blend of glamour and diversity—sun-soaked beaches, iconic landmarks, and a creative pulse that never stops. – Maya Kapoor

destination_id_50.name: Singapore
destination_id_50.description: A global financial hub known for its impressive skyline, green spaces, and iconic landmarks like the Marina Bay Sands.
destination_id_50.review: Singapore was a sleek and vibrant cityscape—futuristic architecture, lush green spaces, and a fusion of cultures that delights every sense. – Arjun Pillai
